TopicTitle: 99 Bottles of Beer on the Wall: Second Round

Articles.Content:
This is a song. We count down from 99 to 1. The lyrics go

Quote

[Number] bottles of beer on the wall,
[Number] bottles of beer,
Take one down, pass it around,
[Number - 1] bottles of beer on the wall!

Don't skip numbers. One number per post. Wait for someone else to post before posting again. When there is 1 bottle of beer on the wall, you take it down, refill them all, and there are 99 bottles of beer on the wall.

I'll start.

99 bottles of beer on the wall,
99 bottles of beer,
Take one down, pass it around,
98 bottles of beer on the wall!

98 bottles of beer on the wall

98 bottles of fun pointlessness!

take one down, pass it around

become demoman 97 bottles of beer on the wall!!

Is there a "dislike" button anywhere?

Python can sing this song a lot faster than me (here goes):

53 minutes ago, Dirkidirk said:

how long did it take for you to write that?!? 

About 30 seconds.  Plugged it into a Python program and copy pasted.

That's not the right ending, @RoninFrog. When you get to one bottle, you refill them all.
